casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rodney Nigee Pledger TAYLOR. No. 317PA14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 7, 2015. Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Taylor, Rodney Nigee Pledger. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of July 2015 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of July 2015."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 7th day of August 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
